text: When adding a module to a page with style fields. How would you set the alignment in the template? In my case I am using a HubSpot button.
are you referring to the default alignment? if so, i think you need to add that under “defaults” in your JSON object

We’ve got several of clients with an issue with a theme module and it seems to be around some changes that happened earlier this week?
My hunch is it’s around modules listening to hubl variables if/then conditions set on the page vs in the module. Not getting any errors in the module or the template, and the module details and the hubl variables are showing correctly in the developer info
To other HubSpotters, I’m looking into this and have some more context.
